title: For Keeps and For Always
description: Eva and Mason have everything they have ever desired, against all odds they found each other again and welcomed a beautiful baby boy into the world. With a wedding looming there is nothing stopping them from living happily ever after.Except Mason’s father, Douglas Harrington, and his twisted obsession with Eva’s dead mother. Will they ever get the happy ending they both so desperately crave?For Keeps and For Always is the third instalment in the For Keeps series. Due to its explicit content, bad language and graphic sexual content, For Keeps and For Always is recommended for mature readers of eighteen years and above.
author: Alexa  Kane
